message.content:
Apologies for the oversight. Here is a revised version of the cover letter with four paragraphs:

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am excited to apply for the internship opportunity at CertiK. With a GPA of 3.4, I bring a strong academic background in Computer Science and a passion for cutting-edge technologies that would make me a valuable addition to your fast-moving Blockchain Startup in NYC.

Thriving in a fast-paced environment, I am a self-driven individual who is always eager to learn and grow. With excellent analytical skills and a quick learning ability, I enjoy tackling complex problems and adapting to new challenges. I believe that my strong work ethic and positive attitude would allow me to make a valuable impact on the team at CertiK.

I hold a BS degree in Computer Science, giving me a solid foundation in object-oriented design, data structures and algorithms, computer networks, and database systems. Proficient in multiple backend languages such as Python, JavaScript (NodeJS), and Golang, I am also well-versed in CI/CD, Docker, Git, Shell, Databases, Messaging Systems, and Data Processing (Spark).

CertiK's reputation as one of the fastest-growing and most trusted companies in blockchain security aligns perfectly with my career aspirations. I am eager to contribute to your success and believe that my technical expertise, strong work ethic, and positive mindset would make an immediate impact on the team. I am confident that my qualifications and enthusiasm make me a great fit for this internship opportunity.

Thank you for considering my application. I would welcome the opportunity to further discuss how my skills align with the internship at CertiK. I look forward to contributing to the growth and success of your company.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
